verbose_text: Because expression of PDGFA only modestly increased cellular proliferation in this context, we crossed N : : TVA; Cdkn2a lox / lox; Atrx lox / lox mice with conditional Pten (Pten lox) mice to generate N : : TVA; Cdkn2a lox / lox; Atrx lox / lox;P ten lox / lox mice and model loss of chromosome 10q, which we observed associated with progression of lower grade mutant IDH1 gliomas to GBM.
